Question: Himax Technologies CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Himax Technologies

Product: Next Gen Color Sequential Front-Lit LCoS and 3D Sensing Technologies

- Next generation proprietary ultra luminous Color Sequential Front-Lit LCoS microdisplay significantly enhances brightness up to 180K nits and delivers distinguished color performance exceeding 140% sRGB color gamut.
- LCoS microdisplay is designed for next generation see-through goggles deploying 2D exit pupil expansion waveguides and features a 40 degrees field-of-view waveguide design with brightness of up to 500 nits and an industry-leading contrast ratio exceeding 200:1.
- Himax exhibits a series of 3D depth sensing solutions for various AR/VR applications, including a vivid 3D naked-eye laptop with structured light vision AI module for real-time 3D eye and hand gesture tracking.
- Features latest generation Time-of-Flight (“TOF”) 3D vision processor, HE-2, with industrial-leading CPU and NPU cores, capable of executing 3D and AI operations on image content at high speed, outputting 3D data at 60 fps.
Summary_cn:
Himax Technologies

产品：下一代顺序显示正面照明（Front-Lit）LCoS和3D感应技术

- 下一代专有的超亮顺序显示正面照明（Front-Lit）LCoS微显示器，将亮度显著提升至180K尼特，并提供超过140％sRGB色域的卓越色彩性能。
- LCoS微显示器设计用于下一代透视护目镜，采用2D出射瞳孔扩展波导技术，具备40度视场角波导设计，亮度高达500尼特，工业领先的对比度超过200：1。
- Himax展示了一系列适用于各种AR / VR应用的3D深度感应解决方案，包括具备结构光视觉人工智能模块的生动的裸眼3D笔记本电脑，可进行实时3D眼部和手势追踪。
- 采用最新一代的飞行时间（Time-of-Flight，TOF）3D视觉处理器HE-2，配备工业领先的CPU和NPU核心，能够以高速执行图像内容的3D和人工智能操作，并以60帧每秒输出3D数据。
